author: Taylor Lyles
title: Sony is giving away Uncharted: The Nathan Drake Collection to PS4 owners
description: As part of PlayStation’s “Play At Home” initiative,  PlayStation 4 owners can obtain free copies of Journey and Uncharted: The Nathan Drake Collection for their console starting on April 15th.
content:
A $10 million fund to support indie developers was also announced
Sony is offering two free games to PS4 owners for a limited time as part of an initiative to encourage people to stay at home. 
As part of PlayStations Play At Home initiative, PlayStation 4 … [+937 chars]
